ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (Oh, Ursa Major pushed him out of harm s way, ok.  I understand now.  Thanks for clearing that up for me, Logo) Double Punch/Counter

(Oh, Ursa Major pushed him out of harm's way, ok.  I understand now.  Thanks 
for clearing that up for me, Logo)


Double Punch/Counter Punch/Ramhorn/Injector/Manterror/Ramhorn:



Double Punch chuckled as Ursa died.  Running over to her body, he lifted her 
off of Dark Mouse, openin a pincher and aiming at point blank range, 
targetint Dark Mouse's head.

---

Counter Punch fired three plasma blasts off at Ramulus.

---

Manterror fired an ion disk off at Striker.

---

Injector fired three stinger missiles off at Archangel.

---

Bumblebee fired three stinger missiles from each of his missile launchers, 
three at Archangel, three in between Striker and Ramulus.

---

Ramhorn leapt forward, punching Double Punch, sending the Predacon asassin to 
the ground.  "That Maximal's sacrifice will not be in-AIE!" Ramhorn yelled as 
Double Punch stabbed him with the stinger on the end of his tail, injecting a 
net poison that would destroy an enemy's nervous system/circuitry.  Double 
Punch backhanded Ramhorn with a pincher of his, sending the badly damaged 
Maximal to the ground.
